## Selector.hasSlotted() function

Whether a selector targets slotted elements (living in another tree).

**Signature:**

```typescript
function hasSlotted(selector: Selector): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  selector | [Selector](./alfa-selector.selector.md) |  |

**Returns:**

boolean

## Remarks

`::slotted` inside a complex selector, not in rightmost position, does not match anything. Complex.matches currently let it match stuff, but hasSlotted should make sure we never call it that wayâ€¦
